title: 7.3.5 Create cost API endpoints
body:
## Parent Issue
#31 - 7.3 Cost Analysis Scanner

## Objective
Create REST API endpoints for cost analysis.

## Endpoints
- POST /api/v1/cost/scan - Start cost scan
- GET /api/v1/cost/summary - Get cost summary
- GET /api/v1/cost/findings - List cost findings
- PUT /api/v1/cost/findings/:id - Update status

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/cost.py`

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
